title: [Large-Scale] Effective Multimedia Design Strategies in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of online learning environments
context.additional_context: Conducted in real-time online environments using learners' personal devices for social sector job training, aiming to minimize cognitive load and enhance learning efficiency through multimedia design principles in self-directed settings.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain multimedia materials applying modality principles in online learning environments.
Learners can present three or more multimedia design strategies to reduce cognitive load during self-directed learning.
Learners can achieve an 80% or higher accuracy rate on assessment items comparing the effects of audio-text combinations in database management learning content.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
